title: Satisfied with the looks and quality
review: Well finished. Fitted perfectly to the phone. Gives good grip. Good quality.

title: Worth the pay!
review: Wonderful! the case is as expected. The lightning connector and headphone jack has been covered with a small attachment from case which can be opened when necessary which is perfect. makes my phone feel light and handy. Order was delivered a day in advance!

title: Side buttons very hard to press. Wont recommend.
review: Uneven cut at the back. Side buttons are very hard to press.

title: Superb cover for your I phone 6
review:
Superb cover for I phone 6. 

I have been using this since past 4 weeks now but, experience has been very good with this cover. 

Advise all readers to move on with this cover. 


Thanks

title: Best in the market!
review:
Thanks flipkart for fast delihvery.
it is one of the best cover for iphone 6.
im using it since last 6 months and there is no scratch or any dent is on cover.
phone perfectly fit in it and rubber quality is best.
people who looks for simple and best cover can buy it without any doubt.
go for it.

title: Gud Quality
review:
Back cover is Gud for a price range of 150.

Pros : 

The charging connector & headphone jack is having a small attachment from case which can open if required. That's perfect.

Overall fitting is gud.

Cons :

Back logo circle cut at the back is uneven.
Side buttons are very hard to press.

title: Don't waste your money
review: Bad. Don't go by the pictures, it is nothing like it. I would prefer spending 500 for such an expensive phone rather than buying such cheap cases. It covers the body completely but the cut outs are misplaced. It feels very cheap in your hands.

title: Simply good
review:
Thanks to flipkart for quick delivery. 

Product is simple and good. Fits perfect for my iphone6. Very slim case and grip is the best thing about the product. 

Only concern is there were finger prints on back case. But not a used one. 

If you are looking for simple backcase with good grip, go for it.
